# CoachReflect

> AI-powered coaching reflection journal for sports coaches at all levels.

CoachReflect is an AI-powered reflection tool that helps sports coaches capture, analyse, and learn from their coaching sessions. It provides guided post-session reflections, identifies patterns over time, and supports continuing professional development across football, rugby, basketball, tennis, swimming, and more.

## What CoachReflect Does

- Guides coaches through structured post-session reflections
- Uses AI to surface insights and patterns from reflection history
- Tracks player development notes and observations
- Accepts session plan uploads with AI vision analysis
- Supports voice note reflections for quick capture
- Exports CPD records for continuing professional development

## Target Users

### Grassroots Coaches
- Volunteer coaches wanting to improve session by session
- Parents coaching their child's team for the first time
- Community coaches building a reflective habit

### Academy and Professional Coaches
- Youth academy coaches tracking player development
- Professional coaches documenting tactical decisions
- Performance coaches reviewing training effectiveness

### Coach Educators
- Mentors reviewing a coach's reflective practice
- FA and governing body tutors assessing CPD
- Clubs licensing CoachReflect for their coaching staff

## Sports Supported

- Football (soccer)
- Rugby (union and league)
- Basketball
- Tennis
- Swimming
- Cricket
- Hockey
- Athletics
- And more

## Pricing

- **Free**: Basic reflections and limited AI insights
- **Pro**: Unlimited reflections, full AI insights, pattern tracking, voice notes, CPD export, session plan analysis

## Club Licensing

CoachReflect offers club and organisation licensing for academies, grassroots clubs, and governing bodies who want to embed reflective practice across their coaching staff.

## Key Features

### Guided Post-Session Reflections
- Structured prompts that guide coaches through what went well, what to improve, and next steps
- Tailored to sport and session type
- Quick capture or detailed deep-dive options

### AI-Powered Insights
- Pattern recognition across multiple reflections
- Identifies recurring themes, strengths, and development areas
- Suggests focus areas based on reflection history

### Player Development Notes
- Track individual player observations over time
- Link player notes to specific sessions
- Monitor progress across the season

### Session Plan Upload with AI Vision
- Upload session plans as images or PDFs
- AI analyses the session structure and offers feedback
- Links session plans to post-session reflections

### Voice Note Reflections
- Record reflections on the go after training
- AI transcribes and structures the content
- Perfect for time-poor coaches heading home from the pitch

### CPD Export
- Export reflection history as a professional CPD record
- Formatted for FA, UEFA, and governing body requirements
- Evidence of reflective practice for coaching qualifications

Built by 360TFT (360 Total Football Training).
